item.description:
Wow, these shows are just getting funnier and funnier! Bet you're still laughing about the 6 year old evil daughter, 'hisss'.....hey, ya had to be there!

I have no idea where Mike finds these great comedians, but he tells me we'll have different ones every time,........and this time we have;Graig Murphy, Brad Mastrangelo, and Chris Cameron.

So last time you were ROFLYAO, well this time you'll be RDSODISLYAO *

 

GRAIG MURPHY rapidly shot to comedic fame in part due to his hilarious work on WEEI radio followed by the realization that Murphy’s comedy reaches virtually everyone in the crowd. Murphy now performs across the country with stops at some of the top rooms like The Riviera in Vegas, Comix at Foxwoods, the Comedy Connections and more. He is featured on Sirius XM Radio, and has been seen on Comcast Comedy Spotlight.

As a newcomer to the comedy scene, Graig is wowing audiences with his impressions of local sports owners and players and can keep the laughs coming with his talented wit. Come see Boston's Up and Coming Star performer.

BRAD MASTRANGELO

Since Brad Mastrangelo was first pushed on the stage from a dare in 1991, he has been in constant demand from Boston to Las Vegas.

The ultimate story teller, Brad's unique routine never fails to hit home with audiences of all ages and backgrounds. The following rave reviews attest to his talent.

"Brad's high energy makes the crowd feel like they are on a carnival ride that they wish would never end" The Salem Evening News.

Steve Morse of the Boston Globe writes, "Brad's street smart humor makes everybody in the audience feel like they grew up next door to him.

Vince Longo, General Manager of the South Shore Music Theater, "It's not to often that someone grabs my attention like Brad did. He was hysterical, likable, and most importantly, clean. We can't wait to have him back."


CHRIS CAMERON

Click on his name above to see him on -YouTube

What, he's short!

 

--- Price is still only $15. Pay at the door.

--- Plenty of parking available just across the street!

--- Appetizers and cash bar always available!!

---NEW Fill out an entry form when you arrive for surprise gifts!!!Drawings held the night if the show.

My Contact # is (603) 759-9876

 

*Couldn't keep you guessing forever! (Rolling Down the Stairs, Out the Door, and Into the Street LYAO!)


This posting, and the information contained within, is not to be copied, modified, edited, or re-posted in any way without the expressed written consent of the "Portsmouth and Beyond" meetup.com Organizer. Thank you for your cooperation!
item.how_to_find_us: Just come upstairs and you'll see several tables in the center area with meetup signs. Get there early! My cell; (603)759-9876
item.name: A COMEDY NIGHT @ PORTSMOUTH PEARL
